# WFA4133 Fisheries Science Laboratory 1

## Instructor notes

### Preliminaries before laboratory

[&emsp;] Make sure course website is up to date
[&emsp;] Print hard copies of laboratory


### Materials
[&emsp;] Print out of labs (20)
[&emsp;] Laptops for laboratory (5)
[&emsp;] Have mock datasheets ready
 


## Methods

1. Introduce the topic with a brief power point
2. Introduce group assignments
3. Allow students to shuffle around to form groups
4. Hand out laptops
5. Hand out laboratory print outs
6. Hand out mock datasheets to groups
